ComicInfo.Summary: Red Planet [Part Three]: When Boa Boaz attacks, Luke gets Miguel to safety so that he can transform back into Barbalien and fight back. Boaz is temporarily defeated and arrested while in human form. Miguel takes the injured Luke to Dr. Rosalyn Day at her makeshift hospital for AIDS patients. The doctor is a descendant of superheroes herself and recognizes Barbalien, giving him some welcome advice. Later, at the police station, Boaz kills Officer O'Toole and assumes his identity.
ComicInfo.Title: Red Planet [Part Three]
